title: Incident - Request for File Restore
description: A user reports they have overwritten an important spreadsheet and need the version from yesterday restored.

tasks.description: Get the full file path and name from the user.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician has the exact location of the file.

tasks.description: Right-click the file and use the 'Previous Versions' tab (VSS) to find yesterday's version.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician finds a version from the previous day.

tasks.description: Restore yesterday's version of the file to a different location (e.g., the user's desktop) so they can verify it's the correct one before overwriting the current version.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user receives the older version of the file and can recover their lost work.
